title: Pre and post game lobby idea
body: I think that riot should really focus on trying to implement a way to be able to report people for what they said in pre/post game lobby in league. because as we know people can be very toxic if they get auto-filled, if a champion was banned etc. and we should be able to report their toxic behaviour. Recently in post game lobby my team had just won a 40 minute game and the enemy zoe was very toxic and told us to kill our-self etc. Very abusive messages. I brought this up to riot support and they told me to post it in the boards, so hopefully something can be done about it.
